wikipedia_page.main: Eric Thomas Potts (born 16 March 1950) is an English former professional footballer who played as a right winger.

response: Westwood is one of only two players to have won the Sheffield Wednesday F.C. Player of the Year award on multiple occasions, the other being Eric Potts. He has received the award twice, at the end of the 2014–15 and 2016–17 seasons.
